mutants.code:
def find_smallest_exponent(X: int, Y: int) -> int:
    i = 2
    Y_str = str(Y)
    Y_len = len(Y_str)
    current_power = X
    while True:
        current_power *= X
        if str(current_power)[:Y_len] == Y_str:
            i += 1
            break
        i += 1
    return i
